summary.span: N:System.Speech.Synthesis 命名空间包含初始化和配置语音合成引擎、创建提示、生成语音、响应事件和修改语音属性的类。

span.span: The N:System.Speech.Synthesis namespace contains classes for initializing and configuring a speech synthesis engine, for creating prompts, for generating speech, for responding to events, and for modifying voice characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **初始化和配置****Initialize and Configure** 类提供了对安装在主计算机的语音合成引擎功能的访问。The class provides access to the functionality of a speech synthesis engine that is installed on the host computer. 安装语音合成引擎由语音，例如 Microsoft Anna。Installed speech synthesis engines are represented by a voice, for example Microsoft Anna. 一个实例初始化为默认语音。A instance initializes to the default voice. 若要配置实例，以使用其他已安装语音，调用之一或方法。To configure a instance to use one of the other installed voices, call the or methods. 若要获取有关哪些安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed, use the method. 可以将路由的输出到流、 文件、 默认音频设备，或使用中的方法之一为 null 设备名称开头的类"`SetOutputTo`"。You can route the output of the to a stream, a file, the default audio device, or to a null device by using one of the methods in the class whose name begins with "`SetOutputTo`". **创建提示****Create Prompts** 使用其中一个的方法名称开头的类"`Append`"构建用于从文本，语音合成标记语言 (SSML)，提示的内容包含文本或 SSML 标记或预先录制的音频文件的文件。Use one the methods of the class whose name begins with "`Append`" to build content for prompts from text, Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML), files containing text or SSML markup, or prerecorded audio files. 请参阅[构造复杂提示](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361616(v%3doffice.14))中[系统语音.NET Framework 编程指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361625(v%3doffice.14))有关详细信息和示例。See [Constructing a Complex Prompt](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361616(v%3doffice.14)) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361625(v%3doffice.14)) for more information and examples. **生成语音****Generate Speech** 若要从一个字符串，或从生成语音或对象，请使用或方法。To generate speech from a string or from a or object, use the or the methods. 若要从 SSML 标记生成语音，请使用或方法。To generate speech from SSML markup, use the or the methods. 请参阅[语音合成标记语言参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94)有关 SSML 标记的指南。See [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94) for a guide to SSML markup. 可以通过使用引导的单词的发音或方法，并通过添加或删除的词典实例使用和方法。You can guide the pronunciation of words by using the or methods, and by adding or removing lexicons for a instance using the and methods. **对事件做出响应****Respond to Events** 类包括通知语音应用程序的事件，遇到在提示符中，特定功能，如报告， ， ，并类。The class includes events that inform a speech application that the encountered a specific feature in a prompt, as reported by the , , , and classes. 若要获取的开头和结尾的提示符下通过谈到有关的信息，使用和类。To get information about the beginning and end of the speaking of a prompt by the , use the and classes. 请参阅[使用语音合成事件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361577(v%3doffice.14))中[系统语音.NET Framework 编程指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361625(v%3doffice.14))有关详细信息和示例。See [Using Speech Synthesis Events](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361577(v%3doffice.14)) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361625(v%3doffice.14)) for more information and examples. **修改语音属性****Modify Voice Characteristics** 类和并方法可让你修改的特征语音使用， ，和参数。The class and and methods let you modify characteristics of a voice using , , and parameters. 若要修改例如区域性、 年龄和性别的语音的特征，请使用之一的方法类或方法的类。To modify characteristics of a voice such as culture, age, and gender, use one of the methods of the class or the methods of the class. 请参阅[特性控制语音](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh362932(v%3doffice.14))中[系统语音.NET Framework 编程指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361625(v%3doffice.14))有关详细信息。See [Controlling Voice Attributes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh362932(v%3doffice.14)) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361625(v%3doffice.14)) for more information.
